author: Jennifer Drysdale
title: Taraji P. Henson Slays Oscars Red Carpet in Sexy Old Hollywood-Style Gown -- See the Pics!
text: Taraji P. Henson Slays Oscars Red Carpet in Sexy Old Hollywood-Style Gown -- See the Pics! by Jennifer Drysdale 4:09   Frazer Harrison/Getty Images Taraij P. Henson came to werk! The 46-year-old actress slayed at the Academy Awards in Los Angeles on Sunday, working the red carpet in a sexy, Old Hollywood-style gown by Alberta Ferretti. Henson looked absolutely stunning in the custom navy velvet dress, showing off her long legs in the gown's thigh-high slit. Photo: Getty Images The actress, whose film, Hidden Figures , is nominated for Best Picture, accessorized the look with Nirav Modi jewelry and Jimmy Choo shoes and bag. Photo: Getty Images Following last year's #OscarsSoWhite controversy, the 2017 Academy Awards are the most diverse yet. See more in the video below. RELATED SLIDESHOW
